111131.content:
Tifa was up late, upset. It had taken her several hours to rearrange her Materia to her exact specifications after Yuffie was rescued and guilted into returning everyone's Materia. The fact that she stole it at all was annoying in and of itself, but putting it back in, completely wrong, was just annoying. Adding to her irritation, her stomach was hurting.

She was sitting at a low table in her inn room, propping her elbows on the table's surface and burying her face in her hands. A simple groan escaped her when she suddenly let one loose. It was quick, though it made an almost sharp sound, and her tiny room was soon filled with the stench of absolutely noxious gas. Wutaian food was not easy on the stomach. Bothered by her own stink, she stood suddenly and stormed out of the room, sliding the decorative rice-paper door shut behind her.

Looking irritated, she stared up at the ceiling, now content to simply blame all of her suffering on Yuffie: Being here in Wutai, having to spend the entire night resocketting Materia, feeling ill because of the Wutaian food, being delayed with a completely worthless side-trip for a thief they picked up in the fields for no apparent reason... The list went on.

That was when an idea came to her, as her stomach grumbled in protest and another fart squeaked out of her ass. A small grin began to play on her lips.

What happens next?
111131.title: Yuffie

choices: Tifa continues the torture, feeling vengeful.

1111311.content:
She wasn't sure what possessed her to exercise such cruelty, but she didn't fight it. Right now, she felt totally justified, marching down the halls and to the room where Yuffie was sleeping. It was dark beyond the rice-paper door, Tifa's silhouette hesitating for a small moment to collect herself and prepare for what she was about to do.

Tifa reached up under her skirt and peeled away the simple pair of white panties she'd been wearing, carelessly discarding them. There was a little bit of a skid mark, she noticed... and that made her grin more. Yuffie was in for a very unpleasant surprise.

Quietly, Tifa slid the door open, and slipped in to the room, closing it behind her. She moved with relative silence to Yuffie, who, fortunately for Tifa, and unfortunately for her, was sleeping on her back, rather like a brick. The futon was on the floor and was stiff, so Yuffie didn't rouse at all when Tifa stepped over her, feet on either side of her head, back towards her.

She looked over her shoulder and down to the younger Wutaian girl, smirking, then she lowered herself. When she was within inches of the shinobi's face, she held her breath and let loose a fart, right in her face. Yuffie was immediately startled awake, instinctively trying to sit up, which only put her nose directly in Tifa's crack. Tifa was quick to counter her, sitting full-weight on her face, laughing in cruel delight.

Tifa swayed her hips, moving Yuffie's head around with her ass crack as she did, finding it all terribly amusing as Yuffie flailed and struggled.

"Be a good girl, Yuffie," Tifa said imperiously. "I'm just here to make sure that you're really sorry about what you did. You didn't think you could-" A pause, as another fart blasted out from her ass and directly up Yuffie's nostrils. "-just get away with a simple apology, did you?"

Yuffie tried to cry out, but she was muffled by Tifa's incredibly rotund, bare ass, and trapped under her skirt. The stench was absolutely foul, but she couldn't escape, and already she was feeling light-headed from the lack of oxygen, making her even weaker. In terms of physical strength, Tifa was her better. Yuffie was agile, but not strong enough to throw Tifa off of her, even at full strength.

Tifa farted again, letting a small content sigh pass her lips. She rubbed Yuffie's face in it, practically wiping her ass with the girl's lips and nose.

What happens next?

1411.content:
You are a lowly custodian working in the castle of Princess Peach. The duties are about what you'd expect; mop the floors, wash the windows, sweep the hallways, and most important of all, clean the bathrooms. The castle hardly has any male guests or residents, so the men's room is never a problem. The ladies' room is a different story. All the maids and servant girls slobbish habits in the restroom that they could never display anywhere else, and you obviously won't be doing much complaining when your boss is a princess; it's your responsibility to make sure the restroom is spick and span whenever Peach checks.

One day, you're busy unclogging one of the toilets in the aforemetioned ladies' room when you hear the door open, which is odd. All of the females on staff use the restroom all at once, when they're on break. Your heart practically jumps out of your throat. It couldn't be Princess Peach herself...could it? She has her own bathroom. You've never heard her in here before. Then you remember; Princess Daisy was staying over last night, and helped herself to Peach's facilities, backing up the toilet in the process. In fact, after you're done here, you're supposed to go and unclog that same toilet. You break out in a sweat, because you've never even met Peach personally; you were hired through one of her many subordinates. She begins to select a stall, and from the sound of her shoes, you can tell Peach is in...
1411.title: Peach

14111.content:
You can't see it, but Peach is wearing the outfit she usually displays for athletic activities; perhaps she finished playing a round of tennis? The clomping of her footwear on the tile is a clue. She's stopped moving, so it's impossible to tell where Peach is now. You really should leave and let her take care of her business.

You exit the stall with your supplies in hand, deciding to move on to unclogging Peach's personal toilet...and almost run smack into her. She's standing in front of the next stall over. "Oh, hello!" She chirps. "I didn't realize there was anyone working in here."

"Uh, sorry," You stutter, "Just leaving."

Peach just giggles. "Why so nervous? Are you even done with what you were doing?"

"I-I can come back to it. I really wouldn't want to impose on your privacy or anything. You're the princess, after all."

"You don't look familiar." Peach notices. "Are you new here? I always like to meet the staff personally, so why don't you stay for a little bit and finish up your chore while we talk? I'm not shy. There's no reason you to be."

"Is...that an order?" You're still hoping to find a way out of this awkward situation, even though the princess seems friendly.

"Yes, it is." Peach laughs lightly again and starts to take a stall.
14111.title: Her sporting outfit; she's fine with you be...

141111.content:
You've no choice but to go back into your stall and finish unclogging that toilet; as you curse whoever was responsible for dropping that turd in the first place, you realize with horror that Peach is locking herself in one of the booths...the one right next to you. Your eyes end up fixated on her shoes as they approach the white porcelain and turn around. A pair of pink athletic shorts slide down to her ankles, followed by an equally pink thong. Peach takes a seat on the pot as you swallow nervously.

"So!" The princess says cheerfully. "Tell me a little bit about yourself. What made you want to come work here?" You stammer out an answer to your question, not wanting to reveal too much, but wanting to satisfy her. After you're done talking, the clear sound of liquid on liquid comes from the stall, gradually becoming louder. Peach is actually peeing, loudly, with no self-consciousness whatsoever. If the stream is any indication, she really had to go. As you continue to listen to the noisy tinkling, you take notice of the fact that Peach has some really nice legs; very smooth, connected to her thighs and bare bottom. The way Peach's shorts are pulled as far down as possible is kind of attractive, not to mention how she's wiggling her toes as she keeps on obviously urinating. You find yourself hoping she didn't come here to do just number 1.
141111.title: Getting to know royalty

1411112.content:
Just as you finish thinking this, the stream of pee tapers off....and Peach lets one rip right into the toilet bowl. The sound spurts out from between her open legs, and can be heard clearly throughout the whole bathroom. The fart is just Peach's way off letting off some of the pressure before pooping.

"Oops!" Even though you can't see Peach's face, you know she's covering her mouth and blushing. "Sorry you had to hear that." Despite the fact that it was more enjoyable than unpleasant, you nod, too nervous to actually say anything. "When I was little," she continues, "The nurses would never let us do anything involving farts. We called it "passing gas", could never talk about it if possible, and had to hold it in until we got to a restroom. I never even tried talking to them about taking a poo; they pretended bowels didn't exist, to the point they never even came up with a proper term for them." The princess punctuates her story by farting a quiet-but-deadly hisser. "Ah. Well, there's no more of that now, thankfully. You're not uncomfortable are you?" She asks out of the blue.
1411112.title: Peach farts

14111121.content:
"No, your highness," you calmly reply, thankful that the princess can't see your face.

         "Really?" the princess asks you in a surprised tone. "That's…surprisingly sweet of you to say so." The princess giggles after that before a gurgling sound could be heard. A soft moan escapes the princess's mouth which means one of two possible scenarios: either she has more gas in her or she's about to crown atop her temporary porcelain throne—you yourself are hoping that it's the latter. "Are you finished in there?" Peach asks you.

         "Almost," you answer her in honesty.

         "There's also my toilet that you must get to soon," Peach says to you. "Just letting you know in case you forgot."

         "Don't worry princess," you say to her. "I'll get to it once I'm done here."

         "Alright then. Oh, and a fair warning, this might get a teeny bit unpleasant." You tell yourself that it can't be that unpleasant from the way she worded her sentence, but you keep at your work on the toilet in front of you to not draw suspicion from Peach who is literally right next door to you. You hear an intake of air from Peach and…
14111121.title: You're Fine.

141111211.content:
Mmmhh…
Princess Peach had just let out another fart and a relieved moan, with this one being a squeaky hiss that told you the princess merely had a bout of gas. As disappointing as it was, you figured that you were overstaying your welcome in the princess's private company anyways, so you hurried up and finally finished unclogging the toilet you were working on. Still, if the princess was comfortable enough to bust a real grump in the ladies room with you present, maybe she wouldn't be so shy talking about her bowel movements with you.
"Wow," you said with a genuinely impressed tone, "that was quite the ripper Your Majesty."
"Aw, you're just flattering me," the princess replied sweetly. "That wasn't anything real special, just my usual gassiness. Besides, I'm sure you must have heard much more impressive explosions than this." That comment made you freeze up, wondering about the meaning behind the princess's words but dreading what the answer could be. You did your best to play it off and respond naturally.
"N-Nah, not really. I just wait outside until everyone's done before I go in."
"Oh, well that's very considerate of you." The princess's tone remained the same. "Nobody likes being walked in on when taking care of their private business, and so I apologize if I am imposing on your work and making you feel uncomfortable." It wasn't untrue—the princess did have an uncomfortable effect on you, but only because of your intense arousal of the situation happening next to you making it uncomfortable to work and somewhat awkward. Still, you pushed your luck to subtly goad the princess into letting off more steam so to speak.
"Really, Your Highness, I'm perfectly fine. It's just natural the way I see it. Nothing to really be embarrassed about."
"Truly? Then…this doesn't bother you?" You heard the princess suck in a quick breath before a monster of a fart erupted into the toilet bowl, followed by her sigh of relief. Slack jawed and eyes blown upon like never before, you couldn't help but crack a big smile at the princess.
"Whoa-ho-ho! Now that was a monster, Your Highness!"
"Hee hee, I'm so glad you're not grossed out like most people are! I feel so much more comfortable around you already!"
"Glad I could help, Your Highness." You begin packing away the rest of your tools, satisfied with the work. "Welp, it's been a really good chat with you, Your Highness. If you would excuse me, I will be off to work on your toilet and have it done with the best results."
"Oh, wait just a minute, I'm just about finished in here. Just got to put my shorts back on…" After stepping out through your own stall, you can hear the princess pulling up her panties and shorts, soon opening the door after flushing her toilet. "Here, I'll take you right to it. I have some time to spare before my next match."
"Oh, that's very gracious of you, Your Highness."
"Please, just Peach is fine. No need to be so formal you know."
"Right, I'll remember that then, Peach."
"There you go! Now, let's get going."
141111211.title: She Passes More Gas

1411112111.content:
It was a bit of a long walk to Princess Peach's personal quarters, and the whole way there the princess couldn't help but ask you a number of questions, but none of them were too personal. She certainly was a friendly person, easy to talk to and infectious with her general cheer. It almost made you forget that you were on your way to clear out her toilet.
In no time at all, you finally reached the star-spangled double doors separating you and her room.
"After you sir," Peach insisted. You reached out to open her doors…

141111211121111.content:
Inside Princess Peach's room was Princess Daisy in her sporting uniform as well—sitting atop a bucket with plenty of sounds echoing from inside it as she grunted. She was so engrossed in her act that she had barely registered when the two of you came in. Despite having been walked in on—by a man no less, she merely smiled and waved at the two of you.
         "Hey Peach! Oh, and you brought the new plumber guy too! Nice to meet you!" You did your best to not awkwardly wave at the other princess, especially not when she grunted and you could hear the sound of something heavy plunking into the bucket. "Again, I am super sorry about clogging your toilet Peach, I really didn't mean to."
         "Oh, it's alright Daisy. Sometimes you just have to really go. Besides, the new plumber here will have it unclogged in no time." You assured the princesses that even though you weren't Mario or Luigi you'd have that toilet unclogged in no time. "My, aren't you eager to get to work! Still, I imagine that you must be a tad exhausted from working earlier. Why not relax a little bit—tell us more about yourself? After all I make it a point to at least learn a little bit about the people that work for me."
         "You never met this guy before Peach?"
         "Not at all Daisy, at least not until today. He was hired through somebody else so I never had a chance to meet him when he first started working here, at least not until today. I met him in the bathroom when he was in the middle of fixing another toilet, but he didn't mind me being there and all."
         "Huh. Is that right?" Daisy didn't mean to make it sound unfriendly, but there was a slight hint in her tone that let you know not to let your guard down around her too much.
141111211121111.title: Daisy

1411112111211111.content:
As tempting as the offer was—especially with Princess Daisy being so close by and relieving herself, you wanted to be the courteous gentleman and finish up your job, so you respectfully decline Princess Peach's offer and insisted that you get straight to work on her toilet.

1411112111211111.title: Decline Peach's Offer; Insist That You Get To Work

1411112111211112.content:
You figured that you could spare a spell or so speaking with the princesses. Peach turned out to have quite the inquisitive mind, asking after previous jobs you may have had and where you were coming from but nothing super personal. That's where Daisy came in, asking about if you had been on any dates before and other such questions, occasionally taking pause to continue voiding herself into the bucket and asking if it was bothering you. You denied it, but it did bother you somewhat—not in the bad kind normally but definitely so in the presences of the two princesses. As if that was the confirmation she needed, she let loose the ripest fart before taking the nastiest sounding shit you'd ever heard, making exaggerated grunts all the while. Peach lightly chided her for being so raunchy about it and turned her head away from the smell wafting from under the bucket, but Daisy simply said that you didn't mind it at all—using your exact words to say that. For a brief second, though, Daisy had a strange smirk on her lips, and the way her eyes stared into yours implied something mischievous in the princess's intent. It didn't last once Peach had regained her composure and Daisy quickly went back to her normal self, or so you thought.
         You ended up chatting with the two longer than what you thought, and what an interesting chat it was, though not for the subjects the princesses were talking about. The entire time, Princess Daisy was eerily fixated on you and gave you more than a few sights to remember: whenever Peach wasn't looking and found herself distracted by something else, Daisy would flash you more than just a mischievous smile, revealing her curly-haired cunt atop her porcelain throne, though she never did anything more than that. She would tempt you continuously, silently daring you to get closer and making lewd expressions, but you remained professional. After all, Peach was still right there. At the end of it all, Peach apologized for keeping you from your job for so long and asked if you could go ahead and unclog her toilet, which you were thankful for; you didn't know how much more teasing from Daisy you could handle.
         Now inside the bathroom, you took a look at Peach's toilet, not at all bothered by the sheer volume of waste clogging it up. You'd seen worse, and truth be told it was easy to get around to fixing the issue, but before you could actually finish things up you heard the bathroom door open. You hadn't turned around to face the princess just yet, and she hadn't made a noise to indicate her presence, but you were still so close to finishing your work that you had merely asked for the princess without having faced her yet.
1411112111211112.title: Chat Up The Princesses (Don't Reveal Too Much)

14111121112111121.content:
"Guess again~," came Daisy's singsong voice. "Just ol' Daisy here." You quickly snapped about to face the princess, watching her stand proud with her hands on her hips and a confident grin on her face. "Wow, you sure did a number on Peach's little old toilet, I'm actually impressed." You did your best to remain cordial with the princess even as you suspected that she was up to something funny. "Say, you think it can flush right now?" You were pretty sure it could, but you still wanted to fix up the pipework to make sure it would all run smoothly. Daisy seemed to ignore you though, walking over to the toilet with a contemplative look on her face; she ended up pulling the lever and down the remaining waste went. "Well, I don't really see the problem here. You got Peach's toilet unclogged just fine." Perhaps Daisy had a point, but it could never hurt to be too careful when it came to repairs. Just as you were about to check the pipes, you felt Daisy reach around to your head and take hold of you at each side. Wondering what Daisy was planning this time, you let her turn your head around to face her smiling self. Slowly, she redirected your view to her crotch as she positioned herself right over the toilet bowl. Letting go of your head, she hiked her dress up and slid her panties down before taking a seat.
         "So…you said that you didn't mind seeing me on the can earlier?" That was what you said and you tried to reaffirm this to the princess, but her smile only grew wider. "Huh, then why do you look so bothered right now?" You tried to explain that it was because of Daisy interrupting your work, something you really wanted to get back to, but it seemed that the princess had other plans. "Tell you what, I'll let you get right back to finish the last touches of your work…on one simple condition: just show me that you don't get all bothered from looking at a lady taking a dump. Deal?" To say that you were conflicted was an understatement; on one hand you had the perfect opportunity to watch Princess Daisy take a shit, but you also really wanted to just get back to work and get out of there. Plus, you didn't exactly get why Daisy seemed so interested in seeing if watching women go to the bathroom bothered you. Regardless, the princess was watching you expectantly, so you figured that you would rather get this over with already.

choices: Ask  Viridi A Few More Questions
14532222221222211121.content:
You slowly came to, not remembering what had made you black out earlier. You tried moving around only to find yourself being held down by something, and soon you could hear a couple of footsteps approaching you. Opening your eyes, you saw what looked like two men made of plants with strange looking arms and a young girl with some sort of scythe-cane making her way up to you.
         "Well, well, well, what do we have here?" The young girl said. "Poor little human wanders into my domain despite how clear I made myself that humans are forbidden from stepping foot in it?" You were clearly confused by what the girl meant by that, looking around yourself to see where you were. From the girl's face, you could tell she was slowly starting to realize you had no literal idea what was going on. "Alright, I'll bite, what exactly were you doing before you got here?" As far as you could tell you couldn't remember how you ended up here, and quite frankly you couldn't remember anything else either. "Huh. You can't remember a thing can you? Hmm…" The girl looked deep in thought and then lit up as an idea seemingly came to her.
         "Well now, this might actually be pretty interesting…" You saw the girl walk up to you and park her seat right on you. "I am Viridi, Goddess of Nature, and you are a human who somehow wandered into my territory. Normally I don't allow humans to stay in my domain, but considering that you have no idea who you are or where you're from I suppose I can make an exception. However, know that I can't exactly let you leave; my domain is supposed to be hidden from humans, and with you here I can't exactly let you go free with that secret now can I?" So this little girl was pretty much keeping you hostage, but given that you had no memory of yourself it wasn't as bad as it could have been. If anyone was looking for you then they'll either turn up sooner or later or they'll give up and assume you dead, but with how this girl—goddess she calls herself—puts it, it was unlikely anyone would come for you. You told Viridi that you were fine with the arrangement so far.
         "Huh, I thought you'd be angrier. You do realize that I'm basically keeping you here with me until you die right?" You made it clear that you understood her perfectly, and besides if she actually was a goddess then there was really little you could do about that anyways. "Glad that we've come to an understanding. So, if you're going to be staying here with me then you're going to have to be informed of what your duties will be."

info.brief_description: Females from your Favorite Video Games farts and shits on you or others
info.description:
This story is about Girls from your Favorite Games, be it Metroid, Final Fantasy, Prince of Persia and others wanting to take a shit or fart or pee on you or other characters from their respective games.

Rules:
-Any fetish is allowed, but please keep it relevant to farting, peeing or scatplay.
-Giant Females are allowed, but no Giant Males. In addition, only the females can dominate the males. They can also dominate other females as well, but no Male on Male/Male on Female.
-Unless it is exclusively to a choice of scenario, do not write one sentence posts. I want to have at least one paragraph, no less than 300 words per chapter. It frustrates some people, me included, to have to read one sentence chapters that have no depth whatsoever.
-Have fun and keep writing!
